Engineering Support (Pre-Sales) Job at Smartflow Technologies Limited




        
    

        
        Smartflow Technologies Limited is Nigeria's foremost Flow and Level Automation company, delivering premium and yet cost-effective solutions to clients with unparalleled professionalism and skill. In addition to being an engineering-focused organization, Smartflow Technologies is involved in the supply, installation, and support of fuelling systems and equipment, including but not limited to Pumps and Dispensers.
     

            
    




We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Engineering Support (Pre-Sales)
Job Location: Berger, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time



Key Responsibilities


	Track and manage all assigned tasks record with proper record keeping.
	Work with all internal groups, including support, sales, engineering, product management, and consulting.
	Ensure all tasks and responsibilities are safely carried out through proper systems to increase reliability and efficiency.
	Plan and execute project surveys for new projects according to the company
	Improve work processes, set up standards and systems to increase reliability and efficiency.
	Plan and execute project surveys for new projects according to company SOP, effectively scheduling surveys, following all approved work processes in scheduling all surveys, and communicating the same promptly to all parties involved.
	Generate accurate project solutions, design drawings, and BOMS.
	Prepare accurate and timely reports.
	Plan and execute comprehensive project surveys for new projects
	Filing and documentation of engineering projects.
	Create engineering drawings using AutoCAD and other relevant tools.
	Filling and documentation of engineering projects
	Assisting in surveys for new projects to be executed.
	Coordinate with OHS coordinator and investigate all reported incidents (near-misses and accidents).


Requirements


	B.Sc./HND degree in Electrical/Mechanical Engineering.
	Minimum of 2 years’ experience in a related position.
	Knowledge of AutoCAD is essential and mandatory.
	Exceptional verbal, written, and presentation skills.
	Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team.
	Competency in Microsoft applications, including Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.




Method of Application 


Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@smartflowtech.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.Smartflow Technologies Limited is Nigeria's foremost Flow and Level Automation company, delivering premium and yet cost-effective solutions to clients with unparalleled professionalism and skill. In addition to being an engineering-focused organization, Smartflow Technologies is involved in the supply, installation, and support of fuelling systems and equipment, including but not limited to Pumps and Dispensers.

Business Development Officer - Oil & Gas Job at  Enoella Consultis




        
    

        
         Enoella Consultis a unique service provider that strives to establish the requisite Ownership touch in our deliverables. This focus creates an innovative, efficient and sustainable business-line that aims at ensuring that our Clientele’s business assuredly remains relevance with time. We are a team of highly qualified and professional HR Experts, Engineers, Life coaches, Architects, Software designers and Accountants with over 15 years different experiences from each and from different industries.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Officer - Oil & Gas
     

            
    



Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Oil & Gas Services

Role Objective


	We are hiring a high-performing, value-smart Business Development Officer with deep oil & gas industry penetration to aggressively drive sales, grow our market share, and position our brand as a preferred technical services partner.
	This role is strictly for candidates with an ownership and revenue-driven mindset.*


Key Responsibilities


	Aggressively identify, pursue, and close oil & gas business opportunities
	Leverage existing industry relationships to generate immediate revenue
	Open doors with IOCs, EPCs, service companies, and asset operators
	Develop and execute winning sales strategies for NDT, Calibration & Instrumentation services, well cleaning etc.
	Represent and grow the company brand within the oil & gas ecosystem
	Consistently meet and exceed sales targets


Qualification


	HND/BSc in Engineering, Business, Marketing, or related discipline
	Additional sales or oil & gas certifications are an advantage


Mandatory Requirements (Non-Negotiable)


	Minimum of 3–5 years of proven business development or sales experience in the oil & gas sector
	Strong knowledge of NDT, Calibration, Instrumentation, or related oilfield services is a very great advantage.
	Existing network and demonstrable access to oil & gas decision-makers
	Track record of closing deals and driving revenue
	Strong negotiation, presentation, and communication skills
	Must be resident in Port Harcourt, Rivers State*


Ideal Candidate Profile:


	Sales hunter, not an order taker
	Entrepreneurial and target-obsessed
	Thrives under pressure and is motivated by results and rewards


Compensation
N150,000 monthly base salary plus attractive performance-based bonuses and commissions tied directly to results.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@enoellaconsults.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only candidates meeting the stated requirements should apply.
